name: Pearl Box
description:
Your pearls got lost. You have to collect them all! But it is not that easy, because your controls are... well... out of control.

Control a needle in desperate attempt to collect all lost pearls. But with each collected pearl the controls shift. Will you be quick enough to learn new controls or will the needle get out of control and crash to the wall? 

Open index.html in browser to play.

Do not use Microsoft Edge and MS Explorer. Use Google Chrome for example instead
